name: Cannalope Haze
description: Like the name suggests, Cannalope Haze is a sweet mix of tropical, melon, and floral flavors. Almost a pure sativa that crosses Haze Brothers Original Haze and a Mexican landrace, this strain is a great solution for fatigue and when struggling with appetite loss. The smooth taste and hefty resin production make it great for producing concentrates.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Focused, Uplifted, Euphoric, Depression, Stress, Pain, Nausea, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Anxious
